message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $11,500. I think it would be a valuable addition to your inventory, and this price reflects its worth.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  Could you do $11,000? It's a fair compromise, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit.
Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $10,750. Can you consider this offer?
